Actions.Name: DateTime to Unix Timestamp
Actions.Description: Converts datetime (multiple formats) to Unix timestamp.

Actions.Name: Unix Timestamp to DateTime with Timezone
Actions.Description: Converts Unix timestamp to datetime with timezone (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX).

Actions.Name: Unix Timestamp to UTC DateTime
Actions.Description: Converts Unix timestamp to UTC datetime (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss).
